      • getRemoteNodeLogFileForApp

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRemoteNodeLogFileForApp(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path remoteRootLogDir,
                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                                   String user,
                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.NodeId nodeId,
                                                                   String suffix)
        Constructs the full filename for an application's log file per node.
        参数:
        remoteRootLogDir - the aggregated remote root log dir
        appId - the application Id
        user - the application owner
        nodeId - the node id
        suffix - the log dir suffix
        返回:
        the remote log file.

      • getRemoteAppLogDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRemoteAppLogDir(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path remoteRootLogDir,
                                                           org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                           String user,
                                                           String suffix)
        Gets the remote app log dir.
        参数:
        remoteRootLogDir - the aggregated log remote root log dir
        appId - the application id
        user - the application owner
        suffix - the log directory suffix
        返回:
        the remote application specific log dir.

      • getRemoteLogSuffixedDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRemoteLogSuffixedDir(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path remoteRootLogDir,
                                                                String user,
                                                                String suffix)
        Gets the remote suffixed log dir for the user.
        参数:
        remoteRootLogDir - the aggregated log remote root log dir
        user - the application owner
        suffix - the log dir suffix
        返回:
        the remote suffixed log dir.

      • getRemoteLogUserDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRemoteLogUserDir(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path remoteRootLogDir,
                                                            String user)
        Gets the remote log user dir.
        参数:
        remoteRootLogDir - the aggregated log remote root log dir
        user - the application owner
        返回:
        the remote per user log dir.

      • getRemoteNodeLogDirSuffix

        public static String getRemoteNodeLogDirSuffix(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Returns the suffix component of the log dir.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration
        返回:
        the suffix which will be appended to the user log dir.

      • getNodeString

        public static String getNodeString(org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.NodeId nodeId)
        Converts a nodeId to a form used in the app log file name.
        参数:
        nodeId - the nodeId
        返回:
        the node string to be used to construct the file name.

      • getRemoteAppLogDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRemoteAppLogDir(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                           org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                           String appOwner)
                                                    throws IOException
        Return the remote application log directory.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration
        appId - the application
        appOwner - the application owner
        返回:
        the remote application log directory path
        抛出:
        IOException - if we can not find remote application log directory

      • getRemoteAppLogDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRemoteAppLogDir(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                           org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,

        conf - the configuration
        appId - the application
        appOwner - the application owner
        remoteRootLogDir - the remote root log directory
        suffix - the log directory suffix
        返回:
        the remote application log directory path
        抛出:

      • getRemoteNodeFileDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.RemoteIterator<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> getRemoteNodeFileDir(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                                                                        org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                                                                        String appOwner,
                                                                                                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path remoteRootLogDir,
                                                                                                        String suffix)
                                                                                                 throws IOException
        Get all available log files under remote app log directory.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration
        appId - the applicationId
        appOwner - the application owner
        remoteRootLogDir - the remote root log directory
        suffix - the log directory suffix
        返回:
        the iterator of available log files
        抛出:
        IOException - if there is no log file available

        conf - the configuration
        appId - the applicationId
        appOwner - the application owner
        remoteRootLogDir - the remote root log directory
        suffix - the log directory suffix
        返回:
        the list of available log files
        抛出:
        IOException - if there is no log file available
